Macromedia Wants Your Input

06 May 1999

"The Dreamweaver and Fireworks teams are currently in a round of customer interviews to help in designing the next versions. Is your design firm in the SF Bay Area?"

"Does your team use both Dreamweaver and Fireworks? Can we come visit your office to learn more about how you work, and how you need the tools to evolve?"

"If so, then please drop a line to Roger Murrf (rmurff@macromedia.com) and we'll take it from there. Thanks!"

Just passing the message along.
